Personally I believe that an awesome story is critical to any scenario.  I've 
seen plenty of scenario's and it seems that all they try to do is make them 
as much of a puzzle as possible.  I don't really mind if a particular 
scenario is relatively simple if it has an awesome story to back it up.  Just 
something to think about.
